summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a plan to have Staley's daughter on a speaker phone call. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended for the addressee only.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email and is involved in a conversation with Jeffrey Epstein regarding a phone call with Staley's daughter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email and is planning a phone call with Jes Staley's daughter.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating about a personal matter involving Staley's daughter.

keyFacts: The email was sent on November 18, 2010.
Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussed having Staley's daughter on a speaker phone.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
